casebody.data:
First Department,

July, 1954.

(July 1, 1954.) In the Matter of the Accounting of J. Everett Vogt, as Executor of Ernest Du P. Meyrowitz, Deceased, Respondent. E. B. Meyrowitz, Inc., Appellant-Respondent; Kate M. Agar et al., Respondents-Appellants.

Orders unanimously affirmed. No opinion. Present — Dore, J. P., Cohn, Callahan, Bastow and Botein, JJ. [See post, p. 844.]
